Adding Metrics to a Report

There are two main types of columns to select from in BusinessIQ: Metrics (sometimes called ‘Performance Metrics’) and Attributes. Metrics are the numeric columns whose values can be manipulated arithmetically. These are the values that you are probably interested in summing, averaging, and so on. There are several types of metrics that you can use when creating a report, which are explained in detail in this section.

Standard Metrics

Metrics with User Defined Aggregations
